WCI
MV JULES POINT - 37,633DWT/10.696M/BLT 2013 - OHBS/LOGGER - OPEN  KANDLA 24 AUGUST (REF MERT)
NAME: M/V. JULES POINT
TYPE: SINGLE DECK OPEN HATCH BOX SHAPED LOG/BULK CARRIER
CLASS: DNV GL
BUILT: 2013 JIANGMEN NANYANG SHIP ENGINEERING CO. LTD
FLAG: HONG KONG
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 37,633.1MT/10.696M/50.3MT
LOA/BEAM: 179.90M/30.00M
GRT/NRT: 24,428/12,772
HO/HA: 5/5
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 46,923.3/45,173
GEARS: 4 SETS X 30.5MT X 24M R DECK CRANE.
SPEED/CONS: ON EVEN KEEL UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT SCALE 4 DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MAX. WAVE/SWELL HEIGHT 1.25M) WITH NO SWELL AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT:
LADEN - ABOUT 14.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 22.3MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 22.3MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED WOG
LADEN - ABOUT 11.4KNOTS ON ABOUT 13.7MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 11.9KNOTS ON ABOUT 13.7MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 2.9MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 5.8MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
“ABOUT” IS DEFINED AS 5% MORE ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION AND 0.5 KNOTS LESS ON VESSEL’S SPEED.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
IFO SPECS: RMG380 ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.5% SULPHUR M/M
MGO SPECS: DMA ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.1% SULPHUR M/M
VSL HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO FOR MANEUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/LEAVING AND IN PORTS AND IN ADVERSE AND/OR COLD WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD IS LOWER THAN 50 PCT IN PORT IDLE. VSL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO IN THE GENERATORS/AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE
++++
SAFR
MV NEW SPIRIT - 58,096/12.82M/BLT 2010 - TESS 58 - OPEN BEIRA  26 - 28 AUGUST (REF SALEH)
MV. “NEW SPIRIT” EX “SPRING EAGLE”
IMO NO.:9425801
SHIPYARD:TSUNEISHI HEAVY INDUSTRIES (CEBU), INC.
YEAR OF BUILD:2010
CLASS:NK
FLAG:MARSHAL ISLANDS
DWT/DRAFT : 58,096 MT ON 12.826M
LENGTH OVERALL:189.99 M
BREADTH (MLD.):32.26M /
GROSS TONNAGE:32,287TONS / NET TONNAGE:19,458TONS
NO. OF CARGO HOLDS/HATCHES:FIVE (5)/FIVE (5)
HOLD CAPACITY (GRAIN):72,689M3
DECK CRANE: ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC DRIVEN, SINGLE DECK CRANE 4 X 30MT (WITH GRABS - 4 X 24 MT CRANES)
GRABS: (MAX 12M3) X 4SETS
SPEED :
AT SEA:
BALLAST ABT 13 KTS ON ABT 27 MT IFO (380 CST) AND ABT 0.2 MT MDO
LADEN ABT 12,5 KTS ON ABT 27 MT IFO (380 CST) AND ABT 0.2 MT MDO
PORT CONSUMPTION:
(IDLE) ABOUT 2.8 MT IFO PLUS 0.2 MT MDO
(WORKING) ABOUT 4.8 MT IFO PLUS 0.3 MT MDO
ECO SPEED / CONS:
BALLAST ABT 12 KTS ON ABT 23MT IFO (380 CST) AND ABT 0.2 MT MDO
LADEN ABT 12 KTS ON ABT 25MT IFO (380 CST) AND ABT 0.2 MT MDO
ALL SPEED AND CONSUMPTION WARRANTIES ARE SAID TO BE “ABOUT” WHICH IS INTERPRETED AS +5% ON CONSUMPTION AND – 5% ON SPEED
THE VESSEL’S SPEED AND CONSUMPTION IS TO BE WARRANTED AND DETERMINED ON THE BASIS OF “GOOD WEATHER DAYS” WHICH ARE DEFINED AS CONTINUOUS PERIODS FROM NOON UNTIL SUCCESSIVE NOON DURING WHICH CONDITIONS DO NOT AT ANY TIME:
- EXCEED BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (UP TO AND INCLUDING 16 KNOTS); AND, OR
- EXCEED DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED WIND DRIVEN SEA AND SWELL UP TO AND INCLUDING 1.25M); AND, OR
- INCLUDE ANY NEGATIVE / ADVERSE CURRENTS
- NOT IN CONGESTED AREAS OR PASSING THROUGH STRAITS OR AREAS WITH POOR VISIBILITY AND PROVIDED NO BOTTOM FOULING DUE TO IDLE    PERIODS OF 20 DAYS OR MORE.
BUNKER GRADE IFO (IF-380CST) ISO 8217:2010 MAX SULPHUR 0,5% AND MGO 0,1% ISO8217:2010
VSL HAS THE LIBERTY TO BURN DIESEL OIL WHEN SLOW STEAMING AND/OR MANEUVERING, IN AND OUT OF CONFINED/NARROW SPACES, CONGESTED AREAS, CANALS, UP/DOWNRIVER, AND/OR OTHER RESTRICTED AREAS, ENTERING OR LEAVING PORTS, AT/OFF ANCHORAGE, FOR BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING, FOR SHIFTING, ETC.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE
